title: Keith Hudson - Pick A Dub (1974) [Classic Dub Reggae]
description:
Keith Hudson's classic 1974 dub album is undoubtedly one of the finest dub sets ever released, on a par with early King Tubby, Augustus Pablo, and Rupie Edwards.
